EmailTemplate.name: Calling No Contact Day 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Is Everything Okay?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
I just wanted to check and see if everything is alright. I’ve been trying to get a hold of you for a few days, but we haven’t been able to connect yet.
Is there anything I can answer for you?
Give me a call at 877-252-9728 and let’s talk about how we can help your business!
Thank you.
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} | {!User.Title} RapidAdvance®
1001 Woodward Ave, Suite 1700 | Detroit, MI | 48226 Email:{!User.Email} | Website: www.RapidAdvance.com
